ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
4 Cameras, 1/3" Effio CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 26pcs IR LEDs, 66 ft IR Distance. Waterproof and Vandalproof
4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HDMI & VGA Outputs
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
ProductInfo.Name: GW High-End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 4 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Resolution Real Time Recording, 4 Effio CCD Cameras 700 TVL, iPhone Android Viewable
